nutrition.title: Smart Nutrition for a Healthy Body

nutrition.label: Nutrition
nutrition.title: Customized Plans to Enhance Your Training
nutrition.description: Nutrition is the key to achieving the best results in your training. With personalized nutritional guidance, you will learn to nourish your body in a balanced way, optimizing your energy and physical performance. Sign up today and transform your health from the inside out!
items: 🔹More Energy and Performance ⚡: Eat smart to improve your performance in training and daily life.
🔹Better Muscle Recovery 💪: Learn what to eat before and after exercise to maximize your results and reduce fatigue.
🔹Weight Control and Body Composition 🔥: Discover how to balance your diet to gain muscle, lose fat, or maintain your best shape.
🔹Healthy Habits for a Lifetime 🥦: Adopt a conscious and sustainable diet that helps you feel good inside and out.
nutrition.callToAction: Discover the power of personalized nutrition and take your performance to the next level!

diet.label: Diet
diet.title: 🥑 Design the Perfect Diet for Your Goals
diet.description: Reaching your fitness goals depends not only on exercise but also on what you eat. With a personalized diet tailored to your body and objectives, you will optimize your energy, improve your performance, and transform your health. Start today and give your body the fuel it needs!
items: 🔹Weight Loss or Muscle Gain 🏆: Adjust your diet to effectively burn fat or build muscle.
🔹Better Digestion and Overall Health 🌿: Learn to choose the right foods to improve your well-being and vitality.
🔹Portion Control and Healthy Habits 🍽️: It’s not about eating less, but about eating better and more consciously.
🔹More Energy and Less Fatigue ⚡: Follow a diet that keeps your body active and in its best shape every day.
diet.callToAction: Start Your Change Today with a Custom Diet Plan!
